review: Fantastic device that does everything it claims.  It interfaces well with Applie iPads and it comes with the USB power interface that allows you to have your device powered by your HDTV if it has a USB port.  Most HDTV's today have a USB port and so this arrangement is idea since when you power on your HDTV, it powers on the Chromecast device, and when you power off your TV, it powers off the Chromecast.Any application that features a Chromecast interface will stream video.  I have used mine with great results on Netflix.  I have also used it with the Major League Baseball package named MLB.com.
author: Kenneth Wayne Stallings "Ken Stallings"

review: There are IPhone apps that can do the same as Chromecast. I have 3 Roku players and thought the Chromecast was an inexpensive alternative. It doesn't come close.  I'm sure those commenters who also own Roku's would agree. I recommend a Roku and installing either Playon media server or Plex media server on your PC. Both are compatible with Roku. Playon has many apps, one of which allows me to watch live MLB and NFL games without having to buy a sports package.
